name: MathJax-demos-node
description: Demos using MathJax v4 in node

scripts.component:tex2svg:tsc: npx tsc-watch --onsuccess "node -r esm component/tex2svg input.txt output.svg "
scripts.simple:tex2svg:tsc: npx tsc-watch --onsuccess "node -r esm simple/tex2svg input.txt output.svg "
scripts.direct:tex2svg:tsc: npx tsc-watch --onsuccess "node -r esm direct/tex2svg input.txt output.svg "
scripts.preload:tex2svg:tsc: npx tsc-watch --onsuccess "node -r esm preload/tex2svg input.txt output.svg "
